name: Holly Golightly Throws a Fabulous Party ... 8.5x11" print by elloh
description:
... originally Holly invited just a few friends but word gets around.

The Breakfast at Tiffany's inspired image (fits within 8x10") is printed from an original by el lohse (me) onto quality 8.5" x 11" (21.6 x 27.9cm) 100% cotton, archival paper with archival inks.

-.-.-.-.-.-.-.-.-.-.-.-.-.-.-.-.-.-.-.-.-.-.-.-.-.-.-.-.-.-.-.-.-.
For my prints, I love the 8.5x11" size for the versatility.

It can be trimmed to fit in an 8x10" frame, or better yet, fits perfectly (I own a few) in a NYTTJA Ikea frame (comes in many colors), or in a certificate/document style frame (most brands have this option in any store that sells frames), and lastly can be placed in a 'floating frame', or a larger frame (11x14" is popular) with a mat that has an 8x10" opening (easy to find in any print/art shop) for the print image.
-.-.-.-.-.-.-.-.-.-.-.-.-.-.-.-.-.-.-.-.-.-.-.-.-.-.-.-.-.-.-.-.-.

The print is signed and titled on the front (let me know if you'd prefer it on the back of the print) comes carefully packaged in a clear protective sleeve in a cardboard mailer, along with a paper certifying it as an authentic elloh piece-all ready to give as a gift.

The elloh logo is not covering or on the actual print

More Breakfast at Tiffany's inspired prints are in the elloh shop in the 'Breakfast at Tiffany's' section.

name: Holly Golightly gets her beauty sleep ... Ode to Breakfast at Tiffanys ... 8.5x11" print by elloh
description:
The Breakfast at Tiffany's inspired image (fits within 8x10") is printed from an original painting/drawing by el lohse (me) onto quality 8.5" x 11" (21.6 x 27.9cm) archival, 310gsm, 100% cotton fine art paper with archival inks.

-.-.-.-.-.-.-.-.-.-.-.-.-.-.-.-.-.-.-.-.-.-.-.-.-.-.-.-.-.-.-.-.-.
For my prints, I love the 8.5x11" size for the versatility.

It can be trimmed to fit in an 8x10" frame, or better yet, fits perfectly (I own a few) in a NYTTJA Ikea frame (comes in many colors), or in a certificate/document style frame (most brands have this option in any store that sells frames), and lastly can be placed in a 'floating frame', or a larger frame (11x14" is popular) with a mat that has an 8x10" opening (easy to find in any print/art shop) for the print image.
-.-.-.-.-.-.-.-.-.-.-.-.-.-.-.-.-.-.-.-.-.-.-.-.-.-.-.-.-.-.-.-.-.

The print is signed and titled on the back (let me know if you'd prefer it on the front of the print) comes carefully packaged in a clear protective sleeve in a cardboard mailer, along with a paper certifying it as an authentic elloh piece-all ready to give as a gift.

The elloh logo is not covering or on the actual print

More Tiffany's inspired products are in the elloh shop in the Breakfast at Tiffany's category on the right side of the screen.
